articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Jack Della Maddalena captures UFC title with slugfest win over Belal Muhammad - New York Post
articles.description: Australian Jack Della Maddalena outstruck Belal Muhammad to claim the UFC welterweight championship by unanimous decision.
articles.content: MONTREAL Australian Jack Della Maddalena outstruck Belal Muhammad to claim the UFC welterweight championship by unanimous decision in the early hours of Sunday, after a climactic final-round scramble… [+2937 chars]
